contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XERU-AM / XHRU-FM | image = | city = [[Chihuahua, Chihuahua]], [[Mexico]] | area = [[Chihuahua (state)|Chihuahua]] | branding = Radio Universidad | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 1310 ([[kilohertz|kHz]]) / 105.3 ([[megahertz|MHz]]) | format = [[College Radio]] | power = | erp = 1,000 [[watt]]s daytime (AM) <br>250 [[watt]]s nighttime(AM) <br> 3,000 [[watt]]s (FM) | class = B | callsign_meaning = Radio Universidad | former_callsigns = | owner = Universidad Autonoma de Chihuahua | webcast = | website = | affiliations = }} '''XERU-AM''' and '''XHRU-FM''', are both a [[Mexico|Mexican]] college radio stations owned by Universidad Autonoma de Chihuahua that serves the state of [[Chihuahua (state)|Chihuahua]]. ==References== * [http://www.uach.mx/universidad/docs/ru.htm Official website] <br clear=all> {{Chihuahua Radio}} {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Campus, college, student and university radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]]] [[Category:Radio stations in Chihuahua]] [[Category:Media in Chihuahua, Chihuahua]] {{Mexico-edu-stub}}
